Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static ArrayList<Card> Deck
      Deck is the ArrayList of Card objects that comprise a deck.
      (package private) int i
      i is used as a count value for passing suit to the Card constructor
      (package private) int j
      j is used as a count value for passing rank to the Card constructor
      (package private) Card newCard
      newCard is an object that is recreated in the Deck constructor 52 times.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Creates the deck using nested for loops

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Card> shuffleDeck()
      Shuffles the deck using the Collections method .shuffle() on the ArrayList Deck created in the Deck constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • newCard

        Card newCard
        newCard is an object that is recreated in the Deck constructor 52 times. Each time it is created, the new Card object is added to the Deck ArrayList.

      • i

        int i
        i is used as a count value for passing suit to the Card constructor

      • j

        int j
        j is used as a count value for passing rank to the Card constructor

      • Deck

        static ArrayList<Card> Deck
        Deck is the ArrayList of Card objects that comprise a deck. An ArrayList is used because it is simple to add, remove, and get items

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Creates the deck using nested for loops

    • Method Detail

      • shuffleDeck

        public ArrayList<Card> shuffleDeck()
        Shuffles the deck using the Collections method .shuffle() on the ArrayList Deck created in the Deck constructor.
        Returns:
        returns the shuffled deck
